title: STEEL PANTHER Announces Feel The Steel 15th Anniversary Tour Dates For Europe & The US
description: Steel Panther will kick things off in the US in Lincoln, NE March 5, and then in Europe in Dublin, IE on June 18.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: Steel Panther will kick things off in the US in Lincoln, NE March 5, and then in Europe in Dublin, IE on June 18.
text: Steel Panther will hit the road across 2025 for the second leg of their Feel the Steel 15th anniversary tour (which will now be the 16th anniversary, but whatever). Steel Panther will kick things off in the US at the Bourbon Theatre in Lincoln, NE March 5, and then in Europe on June 18 at Vicar Street in Dublin, IE. html:
Steel Panther will hit the road across 2025 for the second leg of their Feel the Steel 15th anniversary tour (which will now be the 16th anniversary, but whatever). Steel Panther will kick things off in the US at the Bourbon Theatre in Lincoln, NE March 5, and then in Europe on June 18 at Vicar Street in Dublin, IE. Tickets are available here.
